item.title: Zelensky announces new draft law on anti-corruption bodies after protests
item.description: The legislation sparked the largest anti-government protests since the start of the war.

item.title: Benin names Spike Lee and wife ambassadors for African-Americans in the US
item.description: They are expected to support initiatives to reconnect African descendants with their roots in the continent.

item.title: We might get killed, yet we still go to get flour, injured Gaza man tells BBC
item.description: Many patients brought to UK-Med's Gaza field hospital were seeking food aid but found only violence.

item.title: No survivors after plane carrying 48 people goes down in Russian far east
item.description: The Angara airlines An-24 plane went down as it approached an airport in Amur region.

item.title: Former head of Central African football body jailed for war crimes
item.description: Edouard Nga√Øssona, along with Alfred Yekatom, was convicted of targeting CAR's Muslim population.
